nodes.text: Zir'mai was a male Chiss chief scientist of the Inrokini family living on Copero. In 3630 BBY the ruling Syndic Zenta harbored a fugitive from the Eternal Alliance named Theron Shan on Copero and Aristocra Saganu of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force authorized the Alliance to take action against the rogue Syndic and their traitor. Zenta ordered the soldiers of House Inrokini to stop the intruders, but Zir'mai and his men were killed by Raina Temple and the Alliance Commander.

Chief Scientist Zir'mai appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as an optional mini-boss during the flashpoint "A Traitor Among the Chiss". Killing him is required for an achievement.
